qa_library.title: React Performance
qa_library.answer: Profiler se bottleneck pakdo, unnecessary re-renders roko (memo/useMemo/useCallback), code-splitting karo, bundle analyzer chalao.

qa_library.title: Prod API works locally only
qa_library.answer: Env diff check karo (CORS, HTTPS, env vars, DB IP whitelist). Network tab + server logs + Postman se trace karo. Proper error logging mandatory.
